Author: mattbonie
Text: Thank you!! This made me feel a lot better.

Author: fishonthesun
Text: I'd say, calculate your BMR. Eat at least that many calories (this will ensure your body doesnt start eating your muscles and organs as energy). Then, any exercise, no matter how little, will ensure weight loss.   Obviously, this is easier said than done, but I think this "weight loss model" is much more attainable. But also, let yourself breathe. I know it feels like it (trust me, I fuckin know) but gaining weight is not the end of the world. You can always lose the weight again.   I believe in you, stay safe
